content: Yes, it is important that the government and other stakeholders continue to prioritize environmental protection and safety measures for the transportation sector on the Elbe River. Sustainable and responsible transportation practices are key to ensuring the long-term viability of the river as a transportation route, as well as the health and well-being of the surrounding communities and ecosystems. It will require ongoing collaboration, investment, and innovation to achieve these goals, but the potential benefits for both the economy and the environment are significant.
